mapper.sql: id, w_id, su_id, w_type, sr_id, w_name, w_common, w_uptime, w_score, w_status
mapper.insert: insert into t_my_work ( w_id, su_id, w_type, sr_id, w_name, w_common, w_uptime, w_score, w_status) values ( #{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wCommon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_my_work
id,
w_id,
su_id,
w_type,
sr_id,
w_name,
w_common,
w_uptime,
w_score,
w_status,

#{suId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_my_work
w_id = #{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
su_id = #{suId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
w_type = #{wType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sr_id = #{srId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
w_name = #{wName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_common = #{wCommon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_uptime = #{wUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_score = #{wScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_status = #{wStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_my_work set w_id = #{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, su_id = #{suId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, w_type = #{wType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr_id = #{srId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, w_name = #{wName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_common = #{wCommon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_uptime = #{wUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_score = #{wScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_status = #{wStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.c_id AS cId, c.c_name AS cName FROM t_my_work a LEFT JOIN t_work b ON a.w_id = b.id LEFT JOIN course c ON b.c_id = c.c_id WHERE a.su_id = #{userId} order by a.w_uptime desc LIMIT #{bNumber}, #{eNumber}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_my_work WHERE su_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.*, c.c_id AS cId, c.c_name AS cName FROM t_my_work a LEFT JOIN t_work b ON a.w_id = b.id LEFT JOIN course c ON b.c_id = c.c_id WHERE a.w_id = #{wId} order by a.w_uptime desc LIMIT #{bNumber}, #{eNumber}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_my_work WHERE w_id = #{wId}
